name: hwptoolkit-example-nextjs-toolbar-demo
description: React hooks toolbar demo with Next.js App Router

scripts.example:setup: npm install && npm run app:install && npm run wp:start
scripts.example:start: concurrently "npm run wp:start" "sleep 5 && npm run app:dev"
scripts.example:prune: npm run wp:destroy && npm run example:setup && npm run example:start
scripts.app:dev: cd example-app && npm run dev && cd ..

author: WP Engine
